<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Official_xat_Chats">Official xat Chats</span></h2>
<ul><li>The term "Official" refers to ownership of the chat group by xat.com </li>
<li>Though xat.com staff do not run these chats, they are owned by xat.com and are managed by appointed users.</li></ul>
<div style="margin: 25px 0; width:100%">
<div style="display:inline-flex; position: relative">
<table class="wikitable" style="float:left; margin: 0 15px 15px 0">

<th colspan="2"> Help Chats </th>
<th> Debug </th>
<th> Manager </th>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Unofficial_.2F_Tribute_Chats">Unofficial / Tribute Chats</span></h2>
<ul><li>The term "Tribute" refers to a chat group that may be a useful resource.</li>
<li>These chat groups are not run by xat.</li></ul>
<ul><li>These chat groups might be monitored by staff from <b>Not affiliated xat.com sites</b>.</li></ul>
<div style="margin: 25px 0; width:100%">
<div style="display:inline-flex; position: relative">
<table class="wikitable" style="float:left; margin: 0 15px 15px 0">
<tr>
<th colspan="2"> Design&#160;Chats </th>
<th> Debug </th>
<th> Owner </th>
<th> Language <div class="plainlinks" style="position: absolute; top:0; right:0; margin:-15px 3px 0 0"><a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="http://util.xat.com/wiki/index.php?title=Chats/design&amp;action=edit"><img src="http://i.imgur.com/ZAXUM2c.png" alt="ZAXUM2c.png" /></a></div>
</th></tr>
<tr style="background:#c4ffc0">
<td colspan="2"> <a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="http://xat.com/Fondos">Fondos</a> </td>
<td> Yes </td>
<td> <a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="http://xat.me/i=1501663209">Maick</a> / <a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="http://xat.me/i=824213804">Leonard</a> </td>
<td> Spanish
</td></tr>
<tr style="background:#c4ffc0">
<td colspan="2"> <a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="http://xat.com/Fundos">Fundos</a> </td>
<td> Yes </td>
<td> <a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="http://xat.me/i=2300000">Guinho</a>  </td>
<td> Portuguese
</td></tr>
<tr style="background:#c4ffc0">
<td colspan="2"> <a target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener" class="external text" href="http://xat.com/Graphics">Graphics</a> </td>
<td> Yes </td>
